home_form_l5: Home team's form over last 5 matches (win % weighted)
away_form_l5: Away team's form over last 5 matches (win % weighted)
home_goals_scored_avg: Average goals scored by home team per match
away_goals_scored_avg: Average goals scored by away team per match
home_goals_conceded_avg: Average goals conceded by home team per match
away_goals_conceded_avg: Average goals conceded by away team per match
h2h_home_win_pct: Head-to-head: Percentage of home team wins in past meetings
h2h_away_win_pct: Head-to-head: Percentage of away team wins in past meetings
h2h_draw_pct: Head-to-head: Percentage of draws in past meetings
home_xg_l5_avg: Home team's average expected goals (xG) in last 5 matches
away_xg_l5_avg: Away team's average expected goals (xG) in last 5 matches
home_xga_l5_avg: Home team's average expected goals against (xGA) in last 5 matches
away_xga_l5_avg: Away team's average expected goals against (xGA) in last 5 matches
home_win_odds_avg: Average bookmaker odds for home team win
draw_odds_avg: Average bookmaker odds for a draw
away_win_odds_avg: Average bookmaker odds for away team win
home_clean_sheets_pct: Percentage of matches where home team had clean sheets
away_clean_sheets_pct: Percentage of matches where away team had clean sheets
home_failed_to_score_pct: Percentage of matches where home team failed to score
away_failed_to_score_pct: Percentage of matches where away team failed to score
home_league_position: Home team's current position in the league table
away_league_position: Away team's current position in the league table
home_ppg: Home team's average points per game this season
away_ppg: Away team's average points per game this season
ppg_diff: Difference in points per game (home - away)
home_shots_on_target_avg: Home team's average shots on target per match
away_shots_on_target_avg: Away team's average shots on target per match
home_shots_off_target_avg: Home team's average shots off target per match
away_shots_off_target_avg: Away team's average shots off target per match
home_corners_avg: Home team's average corners per match
away_corners_avg: Away team's average corners per match
home_fouls_avg: Home team's average fouls committed per match
away_fouls_avg: Away team's average fouls committed per match
home_yellow_cards_avg: Home team's average yellow cards per match
away_yellow_cards_avg: Away team's average yellow cards per match
home_red_cards_avg: Home team's average red cards per match
away_red_cards_avg: Away team's average red cards per match
home_home_form_l5: Home team's form in home matches over last 5
away_away_form_l5: Away team's form in away matches over last 5
days_since_last_home_match: Days since home team's last match
days_since_last_away_match: Days since away team's last match
home_motivation_factor: Home team's motivation factor based on stake in match
away_motivation_factor: Away team's motivation factor based on stake in match
is_derby: Whether the match is a local derby (0 or 1)
home_advantage_strength: Historical strength of home advantage for this venue
referee_cards_per_game: Referee's average cards shown per game
referee_home_win_pct: Percentage of home wins in matches officiated by this referee
